name: Grappling Frog
description:
Play as the Grappling Frog and use your tongue as a grappling hook.

-- Goal --

Try to complete as many rounds as you can. You can use the flies but try not to eat them.

-- Controls --

Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump. You need to hold SPACE to charge up your jump. You can press ESCAPE to end your current run.
